programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: The women split into two groups to explore Amsterdam; Eileen confronts Lisa Rinna about her lack of support; all of the unresolved issues come to a head while the women are at dinner on a riverboat; Brandi playfully slaps Lisa Vanderpump.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Lisa Vanderpump refuses to accept Brandi's apology; the women return home after a final dinner in Amsterdam; Brandi gets bad news about her father's health; Kyle angrily reveals to Kim what Brandi has been saying behind her back.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: The women attend an over-the-top party thrown by friend Adrienne Maloof; Lisa Vanderpump confronts Brandi about the slap delivered in Amsterdam; Kyle gets angry with Lisa Rinna for not corroborating that Brandi is worried about Kim's sobriety.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Yolanda reveals the difficulties she faces with Lyme disease; Kim declares she takes more pride in the roles she chooses than Lisa Rinna; Lisa Vanderpump and Brandi get into an argument; Yolanda defends her daughter against one of Brandi's comments.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: The housewives relive good times and air their grievances; Eileen discusses how Brandi went from being a fan to a wine-tossing foe; Kim hints she has something to reveal about Lisa Rinna's husband; Kim and Kyle vacillate between anger and tears.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: The women laugh about who has the dirtiest mouth; Kim reveals threatening text messages she received from Lisa Rinna after Adrienne's party; Kyle and Brandi argue about Amsterdam's space cakes; Kyle and Kim's relationship continues to unravel.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Never-before-seen moments; Eileen primps for the Emmy Awards; Kyle's daughter, Portia, decides to pursue an acting career; the women delve into Yolanda's past; Kim confronts Lisa Rinna about the threatening text messages she sent.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: The housewives (minus Taylor) discuss the suicide of Russell Armstrong; a dinner party at Adrienne's house celebrates Camille's guest-starring role on a major television sitcom.

programme.desc: Kenya throws a party, and everyone must attend wearing assigned costumes.
